data.title: Prior XY Stages for Upright Microscopes
data.text:
Prior's motorised linear XY stages, or translation stages, ensure high-precision positioning. Prior offer a choice of robust and reliable stepper motors and high-speed linear motors with different travel ranges and load capacities. Travel ranges are available from 50 to 300 mm with maximum loads from 6 to 100 kg.

Compatible with most microscopes on the market, Prior motorised stages are suitable for a wide range of microscopy and materials science applications, including live cell imaging, physiology, neuroscience and surface testing, profiling and hardness testing. Our linear and stepper motor stages are suitable for all optical microscopy techniques including bright field, fluorescence (widefield and confocal), and electrophysiology.

Order with confidence: Prior offer a 5-year warranty for all their stages.
